overview:
I have a passion for the inner workings of Silicon Valley and would like nothing more than to develop a name for myself along side the great technology entrepreneurs.

I am fascinated with the development of creative new technologies. Thatâ€™s the way I focus my abilities. At the University I was able to hone those skills. Additionally a further driving force for success was my increased knowledge of marketing, investing, and organizational development. Ever since I knew I wanted to be part of a tech start-up.

Currently I am skilled at CSS, PHP, jQuery, Dreamweaver, WordPress, Drupal, Maya, Cinema 4D, SEO, SEM, Photoshop, Illustrator, Vegas Video and After Effects.

Initially,I started developing programing and design skills by doing small freelance projects. In 2006 I co-founded a web development company called White Label Graphics. That company was a great learning experience and continues to be successful today. Currently TicketCake.com is our flagship project. Itâ€™s cloud hosted software to help small and midsized venues with promotions, record keeping & order processing.

I have so many ideas and aspirations sometimes I struggle to keep them realistic but there is no questions about it, I love what I do and I love what Iâ€™m building.
